Posts.Content: May 22, 2011 07:59PM lisa1000 wrote: First chemo was on 5/12/11 and I'm feeling lucky (almost like cheating) that I really only had two bad days. Second is this coming Thursday. I hear it gets worse, but I'm hoping that years of exercise and eating right will help at least a little bit. My biggest problem right now seems to be constant fatigue and some pretty significant muscle aches. Hope all goes well for everyone this week.
Posts.Title: Chemo May 2011 Cyborg
